content:
Aeraconic intelligence noticed an enemy mortar, which the invaders left with a chain.

About this curious storyShe reported March 24State Border Service of Ukraine.

The enemy was brought into the position of mortar. After causing the Ukrainian defenders of the hassle, he retreated the hostile calculation, and left the mortar in place.

In order not to be taken away by Ukrainian defenders, the invaders were seized by a mortar to the nearest tree and covered with a plain.

After receiving clear coordinates, the mortar border guards of the Guard of the on the offensive of "revenge" destroyed the mortar of the invaders.

BeforeThe Armyinform reportedthat the Kholodny Yar brigade fighters destroyed a group of storms.
title: Defense forces destroyed a mortar chain
description: The State Border Service of Ukraine reported this curious history on March 24. ...
author: Army Inform
